text: How about a knee for #Chicago, where last weekend 24 were shot and killed, 62 injured? None dare ask how many killers came from fatherless homes, a product of the welfare state. Chicago shootings/homicides are up year-to-year despite the #coronavirus stay at home directive. https://t.co/odnJ7u9Pyz
